id: Notion Expenses Tracker - Recurring And Non-Recurring Expenses, Monthly Summaries, Due Counter
name: Notion Expenses Tracker - Recurring And Non-Recurring Expenses, Monthly Summaries, Due Counter
description: Track Your Expenses, Prevent Overspending and Build The Habits Of AccountabilityWhile it is generally safe to follow the old dictum—do not spend more than you earn—you don’t want to get financial advice from designers, especially someone who makes dangerous claims about cost-control management. With that in mind, always consult your financial advisor when in doubt.But don’t worry about squandering your money accidentally. We do that all the time, sometimes breaking a losing streak. features: ‼️ They work universally in every situation; ‼️ Everyone has equal access to resources and opportunities; ‼️ Everyone has the same psychological and emotional spending habits; ‼️ Loans and investments exceeding immediate income are accounted for in today’s dynamics; ‼️ Reduce your savings?; ‼️ Start an addiction like borrowing?; ‼️ Entangle in unnecessary high-interest payments?; ‼️ Limit opportunities like homeownership or retirement planning?; ‼️ Entire income used up before the next payday; ‼️ No room for savings or emergencies
